main event: A civilian observed a bright white object moving slowly in the sky over Hazlet, New Jersey on October 8, 1966.
interesting points: The object moved slowly and stopped at times, then disappeared.
The object made a series of high-pitched electrical sounds.
The object changed color from white to reddish at times.
The object appeared to be the size of a half-dollar coin at arm's length.
The object was observed for about 10 minutes.
